remarks: Addition/subtraction cancellation law for vectors.  ( ~ hvpncan analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Apr-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lmod4.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lmod4.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
lmodvaddsub4.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
lmodvpncan $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( ( A .+ B ) .- B ) = A ) $.
